name: posthtml-head-elements
description: Build HTML head elements from a JSON file

scripts.istanbul: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
scripts.test: snyk --dev test && jscs index.js && jscs test/test.js && jshint index.js && jshint test/test.js && mocha test/test.js && npm run istanbul

author: Andy Walpole
